document.full_text: senate republican leader mitch mcconnell said on friday that the medicare healthcare program will be part of any bipartisan agreement to reduce the u.s. deficit and increase the debt limit.
document.title: mcconnell says medicare to be part of deficit deal
lines_and_colors: senate republican leader mitch mcconnell said on friday that the medicare healthcare program will be part of any bipartisan agreement to reduce the u.s. deficit and increase the debt limit.
